channel.title: Success Business Trends
channel.description: Discussion on the latest business trends and how to use them to increase your business or start a new venture. Whether you are in a Home Based Business, SOHO, or major corporation, the strategies Shane James and Scott Paton share each week will give you a decided advantage over your competition.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Rising Tide Lifts all Ships
channel.itunes:author: Scott Paton
channel.itunes:summary: Discussion on the latest business trends and how to use them to increase your business or start a new venture. Whether you are in a Home Based Business, SOHO, or major corporation, the strategies Shane James and Scott Paton share each week will give you a decided advantage over your competition.

item.title: Business Trends for Success - Podcast #11
item.description: Scott Paton and Shane James discuss one of today's biggest trends - Podcasting. With listenership doubling every three to four months, little or no competition in many markets and huge opportunities coming in the next 6 to 8 months as new technologies come online, this is one wave you dare not miss! Scott and Shane discuss an exciting business trend and persistance. Based on the hit movie, Pusuit of Happiness and its lessons for business success. Length: 13:42 Technorati Tags: cell phones, business, success, NLP, business trends.

item.title: Business Trends for Success - Positive Language - Podcast #8
item.description: Scott Paton and Shane James discuss one of today's biggest trends - private cell phone conversations. Impossible you say? The Cell Zone™ is the first commercial, sound-resistant "cell phone booth" enabling nightclubs, restaurants, libraries, and other entertainment venues to offer people a quiet environment where they can place and receive phone calls without disturbing others. Plus more on how you speaking to the most important person in your business - You! Length: 19:33 Learn more at http://www.salemiindustries.com/ Technorati Tags: cell phones, business, success, NLP, business trends.

item.title: Business Trends for Success - Affirmations for Business Success - Podcast #7
item.description:
Successful business trends are the difference between growing your entreprise or starting a profitable new venture. Scott Paton and Shane James discuss a new powerful trend for small businesses and sole proprietors. Today's episode discusses the power of doing Affirmations the right way. How you speak to yourself does have a huge impact on the successor failure of your business. Scott Paton and Shane James share a great business idea that combines the Internet and Wedding Bells.
Length: 29:41
Technorati Tags: business, Marketing, business trends,entrepreneur, leadership, Innovation, success.

item.description:
Successful business trends are the difference between growing your entreprise or strarting a profitable new venture. Scott Paton and Shane James discuss a new powerful trend for small businesses and sole proprietors.
